title: I'm kinda scared GD
body:
I dunno if I should post this here but I don't really have anything else.

When I was a kid I had an accident on a trampoline where I landed on my neck and injured it. At the time it was a rather non issue but over the years pain in my neck would get worse and worse. Due to a series of bad headaches I went to the doctors a few years ago to get an MRI done and they found that I had a degenerative disc disorder in my neck.

Now fast forward to now and it has progressively gotten worse, to the point where I can't even go out due to the pain and horrible other side effects like tingling in my extremities and difficulty breathing. I get massive migraines on a near constant basis that makes it very difficult to do anything, even play games for more than an hour.

I'll be going to get another MRI soon to see what's up with my neck, I really hope neck surgery isn't needed, I'm pretty scared tbh.
